name: Momotarou Matsuri: Ishikawa Rokuemon no Maki
overview: Momotarou Matsuri feature a story mode that plays like a classic rpg with the big difference that the battle part is a quiz game that the player lose or win money if he answer the questions well or not, if he loses all the money the game ends. The game also features other game mode that is the mini games mode, the mini games are 6 different games (hitting pieces, fishing, avoid being hit, throw pillow, hit with fan & throw darts) and 2 modes that will be unlockable after completing the rpg part.
